name: 3ptych Of Oceans
description:
We haven't seen plastic for a long time, because it was only on the oceans. Now it is moving to our shores and creeping into our bodies. 
"Untouched", the top band shows the ice age of the ocean. The ice that covers it is the purest form of water. 
"Furious", the middle belt shows the sea of love and abundance.A picture of the neck of a white bird that has just hatched.
"Lost", a picture of the same bird covered with a plastic fishing net.
